00014 #ifndef INC_LPC_GPIO_H
00015 #define INC_LPC_GPIO_H
00016 
00017 // General Purpose Input/Output Registers (GPIO)
00018 typedef struct
00019 {
00020   REG32 in0;                            // P0 Pin Value Register
00021   REG32 set0;                           // P0 Pin Output Set Register
00022   REG32 dir0;                           // P0 Pin Direction Register
00023   REG32 clr0;                           // P0 Pin Output Clear Register
00024   REG32 in1;                            // P1 Pin Value Register
00025   REG32 set1;                           // P1 Pin Output Set Register
00026   REG32 dir1;                           // P1 Pin Direction Register
00027   REG32 clr1;                           // P1 Pin Output Clear Register
00028   REG32 in2;                            // P2 Pin Value Register
00029   REG32 set2;                           // P2 Pin Output Set Register
00030   REG32 dir2;                           // P2 Pin Direction Register
00031   REG32 clr2;                           // P2 Pin Output Clear Register
00032   REG32 in3;                            // P3 Pin Value Register
00033   REG32 set3;                           // P3 Pin Output Set Register
00034   REG32 dir3;                           // P3 Pin Direction Register
00035   REG32 clr3;                           // P3 Pin Output Clear Register
00036 } gpioRegs_t;
00037 
00038 #endif
